description: The CASE_EVENT table allows you to report on events associated with case records.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the events associated with this case record.

columns.name: EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No-show


Noncompliance


Time off


Returned to work


Outside consultation

columns.name: EFF_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of the event.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The end date of the event.

columns.name: WORK_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The work status in the event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider in the event.

columns.name: VENDOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the vendor in the event.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who created the event.
